author: Staff Reporter
text:
Novel way to ensure 100 per cent polling

Election officials here have launched an innovative way to enthuse voters to come to the polling booths. Tahsildar (Tirupur North) S. Murugadoss told reporters here that a message on the importance of voting would be stamped on all receipts of acknowledgements for application forms submitted to the taluk office. Those applying for Electors Photo Identity Cards too would get such messages.
title: A novel way to ensure 100 per cent polling
